byline.contributor: Somini Sengupta reported from the United Nations, and Andrew E. Kramer from Moscow.
byline.original: By SOMINI SENGUPTA and ANDREW E. KRAMER

abstract: Report by team of international prosecutors finds surface-to-air missile system responsible for 2014 downing of Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 over Ukraine, which killed all 298 people on board, was brought in from Russian and returned there at request of Russian-backed separatists.
lead_paragraph: A Dutch-led investigation concluded that Russian-backed separatists in eastern Ukraine asked for and received a surface-to-air missile that was used to shoot down the plane in 2014.
snippet: A Dutch-led investigation concluded that Russian-backed separatists in eastern Ukraine asked for and received a surface-to-air missile that was used to shoot down the plane in 2014....

headline.main: Dutch Inquiry Links Russia to 298 Deaths in Explosion of Jetliner Over Ukraine
headline.print_headline: Inquiry Implicates Russia in Downing of Jet in ’14
